reviewText: can not watch it on my dvd player or my computer-- sorry  only have it on vhs thanks for your help!!!
I love it and so happy I found it on DVD finally. Nicolette Sheridan was amazing as I remembered her!

My DVD player wouldn't play this one and so I had to return it back to the company.
I'd order it again if I would be certain that it would work on my DVD player. Out of all the movies I have purchased this is the first one that has never worked for me.

This is a poor adaptation of Lucky/Chances.  It is in black and white, blurry, and has lines going across the screen like the TV shows of the 50's.  I do like the story, however, am disappointed in the quality of the DVD.
When I received this package; I couldn't wait to watch it as I remember this movie. The movie was good now even without the commericals. I want to go on beyond a 5-star rating and thanks.
